Package ApproxsimClient

Interface Summary
ApproxsimWindowListener  
 

Class Summary
AboutBox Simple class for showing an about box for Approxsim.
ActionGroup ActionGroup group actions, allowing a hierarchy of actions.
BoundingBox This is bounding box for an area.
Client APPROXSIM client controls communication between the simulator, the xml parser and the APPROXSIM map.
ClientMainFrame ClientMainFrame is JFrame adapted to use as the main window for the ApproxsimClient.
CommTest  
Configuration This class contains necessary parameters for the actual screen device.
Controller This class is used to controll the simulation flow.
ControllerPanel This panel controls the simulation.
Debug Debug is a class used for debug operations of different kinds.
ESRIInputStream ESRI import tools.
FileExtensionFilter FileFilter implementation for file extensions.
FileExtensionFilter2 FileFilter implementation for file extensions.
HierarchyImportSet HierarchyImportSet is used to transfer objects that should keep their hierarchy to the simulation via drag and drop.
Icon A Icon used for ApproxsimObjects in ApproxsimClient.
IconFactory IconFactory is a mapping of different ApproxsimObjects to appropriate Icons.
IF2Importer A class that handles import of IconFactory2 projects.
JoglLibExtractor Extracts and optionally loads jogl libraries from jarfile.
LSJarXSDResolver Resolves xsd-requests by also using class.getResourceAsStream (Acknowledgement: Comments in this file copied and or adapted from the Xerces library.)
MyClient  
ProcessVariableDescription Class that represents a description of a process variable.
ServerUpdater A class that handles the transfer of updates from the Client to the server (during a simulation).
ApproxsimAbstractAction ApproxsimAbstractAction is subclass of AbstractAction that allows defining if the action is a mutator.
ApproxsimConstants Constants looking for a better place to live.
ApproxsimDialog This class implements the different dialogs used in APPROXSIM.
StreamPVExporter Subscribes to the aggreagate of all process variables in a region and prints them to a stream.
SwingWorker This is the 3rd version of SwingWorker (also known as SwingWorker 3), an abstract class that you subclass to perform GUI-related work in a dedicated thread.
TimeSliderDebugFrame Debug frame for the time slider.
TypeSelector A JComboBox used to select a specific type.
UnitImportFilter UnitImportFilter uses information from a table to add sensible variables.
XMLImporter This class handles the creation of ApproxsimObejcts from xml.
